subject: Harness Racing
Doping (Sports)
Hambletonian (Harness Race)
lead_paragraph: Jeffrey Gural, who has revitalized the Meadowlands and wants to rid harness racing of illegal drugs, co-owns a horse that will run in the Hambletonian on Saturday.
snippet: Jeffrey Gural, who has revitalized the Meadowlands and wants to rid harness racing of illegal drugs, co-owns a horse that will run in the Hambletonian on Saturday.
